title: I JUST LOST MY PROMOS BECAUSE OF YOUR CLIENT
body:
client went black, couldn't pick my ban because of black screen and lost promos.

THIS IS NOT FAIR I JUST LOST MY PROMOS BECAUSE OF THIS TERRIBLE CLIENT SURELY SOMETHING CAN BE DONE ABOUT THIS ????????

replies.body:
Ouch, a loss in your promos is certainly no light event. Unfortunately, we are unable to modify game results after they're recorded, as this allows us to avoid any abuse of the system and maintain the game's competitive integrity.

Black screens in champ select are an indication that your connection to servers is *poor* or *unstable*. Since this is most often caused by unoptimized network settings, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your settings are in the green.

Let me know if these steps caused any observable change.
